name: maths-in-coding-by-bun
description: Learning maths through coding computer games

scripts.start: cross-env SEED_DB=true nodemon app.js -e js,ejs,json, css
scripts.watch:json: nodemon --verbose --watch controllers/seeds/*.json -e json --exec npm run test
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start" "npm run test" "npm run watch:json"
